Comments_List: A good way to keep up to date with a wide variety of work across the field.

The CP workshop scheduled many sessions with Leitner (on Thursday), but this in turn conflicted with the Political Violence workshop (also on Thursday). Greater coordination across subfields and workshops in terms of scheduling would be very welcome.
